effect_entries.effect:
When any of this Pokémon's stats are lowered, its Attack rises by two stages.

If multiple stats are lowered at once, this ability takes effect with each stat lowered.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.

effect_entries.effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
